channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Block Storage Snapshots for VPC (is.snapshot) has a new plan named snapshot-plan-sds
[updated] File Storage for VPC (is.share) has a new plan named rfs
[updated] MQ (mqcloud) has changed the description of the plan named reserved-capacity
item.description:
*before*: Provisioning of your single-tenant environment may take up to 24 hours. This plan is purchased using Capacity Units which provide 5 VPC of capacity for deploying queue managers each. You will be charged for your dedicated environment as soon as it is provisioned.
Once provisioned, you deploy queue managers into your dedicated environment using the ‘Reserved Deployment’ plan. For more information on plans, please see ‘Service Plans’ in our documentation., *after*: Provisioning of your single-tenant environment may take up to 24 hours. This plan is purchased using Capacity Units which provide 5 VPC of capacity for deploying queue managers each. You will be charged for your dedicated environment as soon as it is provisioned.
Once provisioned, you deploy queue managers into your dedicated environment using the ‘Reserved Deployment’ plan. For more information on plans, please see ‘Service Plans’ in our documentation.
